summary: This bill, the Special Government Employees Transparency Act of 2025, aims to increase transparency and limit the use of special government employees (SGEs). It restricts SGE service to 130 days within a year and mandates a public database containing information on covered SGEs. It also requires the public release of financial disclosure reports filed by covered SGEs, with certain exceptions. The bill outlines definitions, establishes procedures for agencies to comply with new regulations and ensures the accessibility and accuracy of the database.
